6 Poin Sikap Kemenpora atas KLB PSSI 2 November 2019
01 Nov 2019, 21:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kementerian Pemuda dan Olahraga (Kemenpora) mengeluarkan sikap terhadap penyelenggaraan Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI pada Sabtu (2/11/2019) besok, di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat. Tercatat, ada enam sikap yang dikeluarkan oleh Kementerian yang dipimpin Zainudin Amali itu.
Satu di antaranya terkait waktu penyelenggaraan kongres. Kemenpora menilai bahwa KLB besok itu sah.
Sebelumnya, waktu penyelenggaraan KLB memang sempat diperdebatan. Hal itu dikarenakan, FIFA awalnya merekomendasikan agar kongres yang mengagendakan pemilihan pengurus baru itu digelar pada 20 Januari 2020.
Namun pada akhirnya dimajukan oleh PSSI. Hal itu dikarenakan adanya desakan dari para voters saat KLB di Hotel Mercure Ancol, Jakarta Utara, 27 Juli lalu.
Penyelenggaraan kongres 2 November juga dipermasalahkan oleh salah satu calon ketua umum (caketum) yaitu La Nyalla Mahmud Mattalitti karena waktunya dinilai sudah menyalahi aturan. Bahkan, dia akan menarik diri jika kongres tetap digelar besok.

6 Kemenpora Attitude Points on PSSI KLB 2 November 2019
Nov 1 2019, 21:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The Ministry of Youth and Sports (Kemenpora) issued a stance on the holding of the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) on Saturday (11/02/2019) tomorrow, at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta. Noted, there are six attitudes issued by the Ministry led by Zainudin Amali.
One of them is related to the time of holding a congress. Ministry of Youth and Sports considers that KLB tomorrow is legal.
Previously, when the KLB was held it was debated. That is because, FIFA initially recommended that a congress that scheduled new elections be held on January 20, 2020.
But in the end it was advanced by PSSI. That was due to the insistence of the voters at an outbreak at the Mercure Ancol Hotel, North Jakarta, 27 July.
The organization of the November 2 congress was also disputed by one of the candidates for the general chair (caketum) namely La Nyalla Mahmud Mattalitti because the time was judged to have violated the rules. In fact, he will withdraw if the congress continues tomorrow.
